resources.string: Click each number tile in ascending order by counting up by 1. But beware because the numbers on the number tiles may change position.
"Click two number tiles that add up to 10. "
Click each number tile in descending order by counting down by 1. But beware because the numbers on the number tiles may change position.
You have 60 seconds to click each number tile in ascending order by counting up by 1. But beware because the numbers on the number tiles may change position .
